trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> objects.

A GridViewColumnCollection object contains a set of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> objects that are typically used to define the columns of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> object.
trans-unit.target: GridViewColumnCollection 物件包含一組<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>通常用來定義的資料行的物件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A> that defines the layout of data in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A>定義中的資料配置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: To receive notification of changes in the collection, monitor the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged> event that is inherited from <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: 若要接收通知的變更集合中，監視的<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged>事件，繼承自<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>.</xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Removes all of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> objects from the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"></xref>.
Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> to the collection at the specified index.
This method creates a new item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection> without replacing another item.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會建立新的項目中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection>而不會取代另一個項目。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection>

trans-unit.source: To replace an item in the collection with a new item, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection.SetItem%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要在集合中的項目取代成新的項目，使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection.SetItem%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection.SetItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: The position to place the new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> to insert.
Changes the position of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> in the collection.
The original position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref>.
The new position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref>.
Raises the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged> event when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"></xref> changes.
The event arguments.
Removes a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
The position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> to remove.
Replaces the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> that is at the specified index with another <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取代<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> ，是在與另一個指定的索引<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method replaces a column in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection> with a new column.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會取代中的資料行<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection>與新的資料行。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection>

trans-unit.source: To insert a new column without replacing another column, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection.InsertItem%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要插入新的資料行，而不會取代另一個資料行，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection.InsertItem%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection.InsertItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: The position at which the new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> replaces the old <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> to place at the specified position.
